<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve a feature from the feature collection"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/collections/{collectionId}/items/{featureId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve a feature from the feature collection

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"collectionId","in":"path","description":"A known collection ID.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["region","boundary","infrastructure","survey","survey_runs","survey_coverage","survey_indications","survey_indication_areas","survey_routes"]},"example":"region"},{"name":"featureId","in":"path","description":"A feature ID which is the identifier(id) for the feature.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111"},{"name":"crs","in":"query","description":"The coordinate reference system of the response geometries. It must be a coordinate reference system supported by the collection. Default is WGS84 longitude/latitude (http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/OGC/1.3/CRS84).","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/OGC/1.3/CRS84","http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/4326","http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/3857"]}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A single feature in the feature collection.","content":{"application/geo+json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"type":{"type":"string"},"geometry":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"type":"string"},"coordinates":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"x":{"type":"number","format":"double"},"y":{"type":"number","format":"double"}},"title":"Coordinate"}}},"title":"Geometry"},"properties":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"object"}}},"title":"Feature"}}}},"400":{"description":"The feature request contains elements that are not supported. Please refer to documentation for examples."},"404":{"description":"The feature collection '{collectionId}' or feature with id:'{featureId}' could not be found. Please check it is a supported collection or feature."},"405":{"description":"The HTTP method requested is not supported. This endpoint only supports 'GET' requests."},"406":{"description":"A request header value was not supported."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
